posts.title: Programming for everyone
posts.description: Everyone can learn to code! Yes, everyone! In this live event, we are going to go through all the key basics and get you started with programming as well.

posts.title: Networking for introverts
posts.description: We know Networking is no fun if you are an introvert person. Thats why we came up with this event - it will be so much easier. Promised!

posts.title: Class for extroverts
posts.description: You probably need no help with networking in general. But focusing your energy correctly - that is something where most people can improve.You probably need no help with networking in general. But focusing your energy correctly - that is something where most people can improve.
